text: The leader of Skeggi is one, if not the most powerful human on the Lustrian continent.
A Skeggi loyal to one leader would surely shift the tides of destiny in the New World.
They smell horrid, yet the Jarl's of Skeggi swear by Soren's potions and blessings.
It is said even her blades and daggers whisper the names of those they are destined to kill.
Jarl Sammi strangled Losteriksson and took over Skeggi centuries ago, he declared the Jungle the enemy and was expertly skilled in slaying Lizardmen.
The jungle raids have taught the Skeggi all there is about the feral beasts that stalk these lands.
Not to be underestimated as both a sorceress and a warrior, Adella's totem is one of many faces.
What the Skeggi marauders lack in intelligence they make up in sheer ruthlessness.
Bl贸m, which means flower - is Adella's pet and steed. She fed it poisonous continously as part of her experiments which caused it to deform and mutate.
Trinkets blessed by Tzeentch seemingly appear at random on the trails set out for her by her many mouths.
None as flatulent as the Legendary Vitki of Skeggi, Soren. His sack holds many gifts and blessings.
Soren is the only Vitki that has King Adella's ear, it is said because he holds a rock Adella believes to be bestowed upon him by Tzeentch. In truth, it's just a rock.
No ordinary hatchlings are the beasts that emerge from Soren's eggs.
A true Vitki knows how to use the local flora to craft potions, incantations and spells a like.
What Soren lacks in mobility the legendary seer makes up in sheer strength.
Soren's Sack is filled with enchanted items, artifacts, trinkets and plain junk. You never know what he digs up next.
The most talented and powerful Seer of the Lustrian continent, Soren holds a special place among the Skeggi.
Erik Fishbrain was the first raider that set foot on Lustria, Soren claims he carries his Horn in his sack - this in no way to be verified however.
She who follows the ways of Tzeentch may recieve his fruitful boons.
Ability number of uses: %+n for "Soren's Sack"
Thousand Whispers: Adella may directly face monsters within the arcanum
High Mono God Corruption in Provinces increases your cap to special units
Lots of talks and whispers yet little to show for it..
Defeated ''King'' Adella of the Thousand Mouths

A magic sword which ignores both armour and the protective scaly skin of the Lizardmen when it strikes. It is said the vitkis of Skeggi chanted unholy incantations for seven days straight without the slightest interruption before it was deemed satisfactory by King Adella.

In the heart of Lustria's dense jungle, Adella of the Thousand Mouths, a Norscan Queen gifted with chaotic whispers, seeks the legendary "Sword of Warping" to unleash chaos against the Lizardmen. With a cadre of loyal marauders, she ventures inland for the final quest battle, the jungle humming with anticipation as Adella prepares to seize the Sword and face the cold-blooded defenders in a decisive struggle that will echo through the ancient jungle.
Adella of the Thousand Mouths is the ''King'' of Skeggi and devote servant of Tzeentch. The thousand holes across her body whisper her Masters sinister plans - which she tries to bring to fruition.
Adella of the Thousand Mouths, ''King'' of Skeggi, plots and schemes in Tzeentch's name as her mouths whisper sinister plans to dominate all of Lustria.

Soren Hoarder is the most esteemed Norscan vitki in Skeggi. He carries an enormous sack with him as he lumbers across the city, full of totems and gifts people have given him for his insight and blessings. But Soren can seemingly see the future with terrifying accuracy and has powerful command of Chaos Sorcery and Dark Magic.
A magical sword crafted from the essence of slain Cold Ones with the power to cut through any armour or scaled skin.
Soren carries his enormous sack full of long forgotten totems and gifts people have given him for his blessings. Their effects unknown even to him.
As his sack slowly depletes so Soren finds better and better treasures, with more powerful boons and effects to boot.
King Adella of Skeggi is blessed by Tzeentch with thousands of half-inch holes which feed her with sinister plans and whispers.
Soren is the most esteemed Vitki in Skeggi and can see the future with terrifying accuracy. His sack is filled with gifts and offerings for his services.
An astonishingly large Giant, the people of Skeggi where quick to name him after Jarl Fishbrain the Red - seeing his strength as a resemblence. The only, one might add.
